project.title: Passive house in Beauvechain
project.subtitle: Complete renovation
project.description: Complete renovation of a 1970s family home into a passive house. This exemplary project demonstrates that it is possible to transform an energy-consuming habitat into a high-performance passive house.

challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.content: The 1970s house had an energy consumption of 200 kWh/m²/year, 13 times more than a passive house. The owners wanted to drastically reduce their energy bill while improving their quality of life.

solution.title: Our solution
solution.content: We opted for a complete renovation into a passive house: external insulation, triple glazing, double flow VMC and photovoltaic installation. The support allowed the owners to actively participate in the work.

technologies.name: External insulation
technologies.description: 20cm rock wool insulation to achieve a thermal resistance of 5 m².K/W

technologies.name: Triple glazing
technologies.description: Triple glazed windows with Uw coefficient of 0.8 W/m².K to minimize heat loss

technologies.name: Double flow VMC
technologies.description: Controlled mechanical ventilation with 85% heat recovery

technologies.name: Photovoltaic panels
technologies.description: Installation of 8kW solar panels for self-consumption

technologies.name: Heat pump
technologies.description: Air-water heat pump heating with performance coefficient of 4.2

results.title: The results
results.content: The transformation is spectacular: energy consumption went from 200 to 15 kWh/m²/year, a reduction of 92%. The annual energy bill is now €200 instead of €2,500.

phases.title: Energy audit
phases.description: Complete analysis of energy performance and identification of improvement points

phases.title: Project design
phases.description: Development of detailed plans and choice of technologies adapted to the building

phases.title: External insulation
phases.description: Installation of 20cm insulation and finishing plaster

phases.title: Window replacement
phases.description: Installation of triple glazing on all openings

phases.title: VMC installation
phases.description: Installation of the double flow ventilation system

phases.title: Photovoltaic installation
phases.description: Installation of solar panels and commissioning

testimonial.title: Client testimonial
testimonial.content: Oveco supported us in this incredible transformation. Today, our energy bill is divided by 12 and we live in optimal comfort all year round. The investment pays for itself quickly and we are proud of our contribution to the ecological transition.
